watching.speaker: Narrator
watching.text: You find Mother in the garden, watching your dragon bask in the morning sun. There's something ancient in her gaze.

mother_speaks.speaker: Mother
mother_speaks.text: When you were born, the midwife said you came into the world reaching for something that wasn't there. Your hands grasping at empty air.

mother_continues.speaker: Mother
mother_continues.text: I knew then. I knew what it meant. But I was afraid... afraid of what it would mean for you. For our family.

player_question.speaker: Narrator
player_question.text: Your dragon lifts its head, sensing the weight of the conversation, and moves closer to you.

choices.text: I feel like I've always been waiting for something.

mother_fear.speaker: Mother
mother_fear.text: Our family's history is... complicated. We carry a legacy that most would call impossible. I wanted you to have a normal life.

mother_waiting.speaker: Mother
mother_waiting.text: *Tears well in her eyes* I know, my darling. And I'm so sorry I made you wait. Made you feel incomplete all these years.

dragon_nuzzle.speaker: Narrator
dragon_nuzzle.text: Your dragon nuzzles against you, and you feel a warmth spread through your chest - a connection deeper than words.

mother_observes.speaker: Mother
mother_observes.text: *Watching with wonder* Look at that. The way you move together. The way you understand each other without speaking. It's exactly like...

mother_stops.speaker: Mother
mother_stops.text: *She stops herself again, pressing a hand to her heart* Tomorrow night. Come to the old sitting room after the cafe closes. There's something I must show you.

end_scene.speaker: Narrator
end_scene.text: Mother walks away, shoulders squared with resolve. Whatever secret she's been carrying, the time has come to share it.
